name: Land Of Conquest SLG
description: SLG is the governance token of the Land Of Conquest game. The total amount of SLG issued is 1 billion, and the initial value is set to 0.03usdt, which is a deflationary currency. There will be a very small amount of placement in the operation activity game. SLG is divided into two types: in-game and on-chain. Players can exchange XTAL to get SLG inGame in the game, and then extract SLG In Game to SLG on the chain, and then play through the Pancake liquidity pool, or trade on the exchange.
